attributes.action: legalise medicinal marijuana for medical ailements of all kinds
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we would like marijuana to be legalised so that we can grow our own in safety without the fear of prosecution and police harassment.we are not drug dealers and it is unfair that we have to associate with people like this to get the medicine that so many of us need,or be treated just as bad because we choose to grow our own instead of fund crime.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
